Literature.Title: Design of Bioactive Peptides Derived From CART Sequence Isolated From the Toadfish Thalassophryne nattereri.
Literature.Author: Conceição K, de Cena GL, da Silva VA, de Oliveira Neto XA, de Andrade VM, Tada DB, Richardson M, de Andrade SA, Dias SA, Castanho MARB, Lopes-Ferreira M

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:50.38% Hemolysis=40 µM,Mouse Embryonic Fibroblasts (MEF):0% Cytotoxicity=10 µM,Mouse Embryonic Fibroblasts (MEF):10% Cytotoxicity=40 µM
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=2.1±0.2µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 15442(MIC=2.1±0.3µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 6538(MIC=>40µM),Staphylococcus hominis ATCC 27844(MIC=8.3µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 2912(MIC=8.3µM),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=13.5µM)
